001
002/**
003 * DÃ©crivez votre classe UserInterface ici.
004 *
005 * @author (votre nom)
006 * @version (un numÃ©ro de version ou une date)
007 */
008import javax.swing.JFrame;
009import javax.swing.JTextField;
010import javax.swing.JTextArea;
011import javax.swing.JLabel;
012import javax.swing.ImageIcon;
013import javax.swing.JScrollPane;
014import javax.swing.JPanel;
015import javax.swing.JButton;
016import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
017import java.awt.event.WindowAdapter;
018import java.awt.event.WindowEvent;
019import java.awt.Dimension;
020import java.awt.BorderLayout;
021import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
022import java.net.URL;
023import java.awt.GridLayout;
024import java.awt.Color;
025import java.awt.*;
026
027/**
028 * This class implements a simple graphical user interface with a 
029 * text entry area, a text output area and an optional image.
030 * 
031 * @author Michael Kolling
032 * @version 1.0 (Jan 2003) DB edited (2023)
033 */
034public class UserInterface implements ActionListener
035{
036    private GameEngine aEngine;
037    private JFrame     aMyFrame;
038    private JTextField aEntryField;
039    private JTextArea  aLog;
040    private JLabel     aImage;
041    private JButton aButtonNorth;
042    private JButton aButtonSouth;
043    private JButton aButtonEast;
044    private JButton aButtonWest;
045    private JButton aButtonEat;
046    private JButton aButtonDown;
047    private JButton aButtonUp;
048    private JPanel  aPanelEast;
049    private JPanel aPanelWest;
050    private JButton aButtonRespawn;
051    
052    /**
053     * Construct a UserInterface. As a parameter, a Game Engine
054     * (an object processing and executing the game commands) is
055     * needed.
056     * 
057     * @param pGameEngine  The GameEngine object implementing the game logic.
058     */
059    public UserInterface( final GameEngine pGameEngine )
060    {
061        this.aEngine = pGameEngine;
062        this.createGUI();
063    } // UserInterface(.)
064
065    /**
066     * Print out some text into the text area.
067     */
068    public void print( final String pText )
069    {
070        this.aLog.append( pText );
071        this.aLog.setCaretPosition( this.aLog.getDocument().getLength() );
072    } // print(.)
073
074    /**
075     * Print out some text into the text area, followed by a line break.
076     */
077    public void println( final String pText )
078    {
079        this.print( pText + "\n" );
080    } // println(.)
081
082    /**
083     * Show an image file in the interface.
084     */
085    public void showImage( final String pImageName )
086    {
087        String vImagePath = "" + pImageName; // to change the directory
088        URL vImageURL = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource( vImagePath );
089        if ( vImageURL == null )
090            System.out.println( "Image not found : " + vImagePath );
091        else {
092            ImageIcon vIcon = new ImageIcon( vImageURL);
093            Image image = vIcon.getImage(); 
094            image = image.getScaledInstance(512, 512, Image.SCALE_SMOOTH);
095            vIcon = new ImageIcon(image);
096            this.aImage.setIcon( vIcon );
097            this.aMyFrame.pack();
098        }
099    } // showImage(.)
100
101    /**
102     * Enable or disable input in the entry field.
103     */
104    public void enable( final boolean pOnOff )
105    {
106        this.aEntryField.setEditable( pOnOff ); // enable/disable
107        if ( pOnOff ) { // enable
108            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 0 ); // cursor blink
109            this.aEntryField.removeActionListener( this ); // reacts to entry
110        }
111        this.aButtonNorth.setEnabled(pOnOff);
112        this.aButtonSouth.setEnabled(pOnOff);
113        this.aButtonEast.setEnabled(pOnOff);
114        this.aButtonWest.setEnabled(pOnOff);
115        this.aButtonEat.setEnabled(pOnOff);
116        this.aButtonUp.setEnabled(pOnOff);
117        this.aButtonDown.setEnabled(pOnOff);
118        this.aButtonRespawn.setEnabled(pOnOff);
119    } // enable(.)
120
121    /**
122     * Set up graphical user interface.
123     */
124    private void createGUI()
125    {
126        this.aMyFrame = new JFrame( "The Crossing" ); // change the title !
127        this.aEntryField = new JTextField( 34 );
128
129        this.aLog = new JTextArea();
130        this.aLog.setEditable( false );
131        JScrollPane vListScroller = new JScrollPane( this.aLog );
132        vListScroller.setPreferredSize( new Dimension(200, 200) );
133        vListScroller.setMinimumSize( new Dimension(100,100) );
134
135        this.aImage = new JLabel();
136        JPanel vPanel = new JPanel();
137        
138        vPanel.setLayout( new BorderLayout() ); // ==> only five places
139        vPanel.add( this.aImage, BorderLayout.NORTH );
140        vPanel.add( vListScroller, BorderLayout.CENTER );
141        vPanel.add( this.aEntryField, BorderLayout.SOUTH );
142        
143        this.aPanelEast = new JPanel();
144        this.aPanelEast.setLayout(new GridLayout(2,3));
145        
146        this.aButtonNorth = new JButton ("North");
147        this.aButtonNorth.addActionListener( this );
148        this.aButtonNorth.setBackground(Color.black);
149        this.aPanelEast.add(this.aButtonNorth);
150        
151        this.aButtonSouth = new JButton ("South");
152        this.aButtonSouth.addActionListener( this );
153        this.aButtonSouth.setBackground(Color.black);
154        this.aPanelEast.add(this.aButtonSouth);
155        
156        this.aButtonEast = new JButton ("East");
157        this.aButtonEast.addActionListener( this );
158        this.aButtonEast.setBackground(Color.black);
159        this.aPanelEast.add(this.aButtonEast);
160        
161        this.aButtonWest = new JButton ("West");
162        this.aButtonWest.addActionListener( this );
163        this.aButtonWest.setBackground(Color.black);
164        this.aPanelEast.add(this.aButtonWest);
165        
166        this.aButtonEat = new JButton ("Eat");
167        this.aButtonEat.addActionListener( this );
168        this.aButtonEat.setBackground(Color.black);
169        this.aPanelEast.add(this.aButtonEat);
170        
171        this.aButtonUp = new JButton ("Up");
172        this.aButtonUp.addActionListener( this );
173        this.aButtonUp.setBackground(Color.black);
174        this.aPanelEast.add(this.aButtonUp);
175        
176        this.aButtonDown = new JButton ("Down");
177        this.aButtonDown.addActionListener( this );
178        this.aButtonDown.setBackground(Color.black);
179        this.aPanelEast.add(this.aButtonDown);
180        
181        this.aButtonRespawn = new JButton ("Respawn");
182        this.aButtonRespawn.addActionListener( this );
183        this.aButtonRespawn.setBackground(Color.black);
184        this.aPanelEast.add(this.aButtonRespawn);
185        
186        vPanel.add(this.aPanelEast, BorderLayout.EAST);
187        this.aMyFrame.getContentPane().add( vPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER );
188
189        // add some event listeners to some components
190        this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this );
191
192        // to end program when window is closed
193        this.aMyFrame.addWindowListener(
194            new WindowAdapter() { // anonymous class
195                @Override public void windowClosing(final WindowEvent pE)
196                {
197                    System.exit(0);
198                }
199        } );
200
201        this.aMyFrame.pack();
202        this.aMyFrame.setVisible( true );
203        this.aEntryField.requestFocus();
204    } // createGUI()
205
206    /**
207     * Actionlistener interface for entry textfield.
208     */
209    @Override public void actionPerformed( final ActionEvent pE ) 
210    {
211        // no need to check the type of action at the moment
212        // because there is only one possible action (text input) :
213        // this.processCommand();
214        if(pE.getSource() == this.aButtonNorth){// never suppress this line
215        this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go North");
216    } // actionPerformed(.)
217    else if (pE.getSource() == this.aButtonSouth){
218        this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go South");
219    }
220    else if (pE.getSource() == this.aButtonEast){
221        this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go East");
222    }
223    else if (pE.getSource() == this.aButtonWest){
224        this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go West");
225    }
226    else if (pE.getSource() == this.aButtonEat){
227        this.aEngine.interpretCommand("eat");
228    }
229    else if (pE.getSource() == this.aButtonUp){
230        this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go Up");
231    }
232    else if (pE.getSource() == this.aButtonDown){
233        this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go Down");
234    }
235    else if (pE.getSource() == this.aButtonRespawn) {
236        this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go Respawn");
237    }
238    else this.processCommand();
239}
240
241    /**
242     * A command has been entered in the entry field.  
243     * Read the command and do whatever is necessary to process it.
244     */
245    private void processCommand()
246    {
247        String vInput = this.aEntryField.getText();
248        this.aEntryField.setText( "" );
249
250        this.aEngine.interpretCommand( vInput );
251    } // processCommand()
252    
253} // UserInterface
